A fun game filled with developer incompetence and rampant high tier cheating(easy anti-cheat, its just in the name). Game balance is always the same meta wise for years and every new killer is the same as the last just slightly different. It wouldnâ€™t be as bad if Bhvr didnâ€™t copy their own fucking homework from 4 weeks ago with every "new" thing they make. Adren, sprint, DEADARD, DS, spine, boon: bandaid, only with slight deviation on lower ranks and better players who donâ€™t have their keyboard sown on to their cock. Suvi is either boring m1 holding and hook swapping or piss in the blood stream with ultra meta nurse and getting 4k 5-3gen floored. Killer is frustrating going 0-2k every game with any off meta perks and m1 killers in general, or still frustrating playing meta and burning out from stress. The monthly player numbers don't lie, devs think its Esport ready when its barely worthy of being considered in beta with poor balance and feature bloat. The best thing for this god forsaken game and itâ€™s devs is a chapter 13 bankruptcy. 3/10 would not waste brain cells for a melting glass of cheap whiskey on the rocks thatâ€™s ice is made of a hookers crotch rot in a Loves gas station beer section.
